# Funglet Spells
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Funglets|funglet]] spells introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Carnivorous Mushroom]]
- [[Fiber Shape]]
- [[Fungal Infestation]]
- [[Fungicide]]
- [[Fungus Amongus]]
- [[Ironfibre]]
- [[Medicinal Mushrooms]]
- [[Mushroom Apotheosis]]
- [[Mushroom Mount]]
- [[Peripheral Fungi]]
- [[Spores of Madness]]
